title: Breath: Box Breathing
summary: Slow your system in 4 steady counts.
body: Inhale 4 • Hold 4 • Exhale 4 • Hold 4. Repeat 4–6 cycles. Focus on the corners of a square.

title: Breath: 4-7-8 Reset
body: Inhale 4 • Hold 7 • Exhale 8. Do 4 cycles; keep tongue on the roof of mouth, exhale softly.

title: Focus: 3-minute Tab Triage
body: Set a 3-minute timer. Close 3 tabs. Pick 1 task. Commit: ‘Just the next 10 minutes’.

title: Ground: Five Senses Scan
summary: Return to the room in 60 seconds.
body: Name 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.

title: Energy: 20-20-20 Walk
body: Walk 20 minutes; the first 20 outside if possible; last 20 seconds: 6 deep breaths.

title: Sleep: Digital Sunset
body: Pick a ‘screens-off’ time 60–90 mins before bed. Set warm lights, cue calm audio, write tomorrow’s top 3.
